instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2

title: What happened in the story 'Three Families'?
subject: Lang

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Read the story with the teacher. Click on the sentences to practice reading:
text: All over the world, families have fun and work together.
Ayesha and her brother go shopping with grandma.
What is in the shopping cart? What's next on the list?
Kadar looks at his family's calendar.
Today is Saturday, Dad and Amira play with their boat
Mum and Asha play music together.
Kadar goes out to meet his friend.
What do Kadar and his friends do?

instructions.c: Open your book on page 47. Practice reading the sentences on exercise 4 and, on paper, draw what you and your family like to do.
HOMEWORK: Write tomorrow's date on page 43 in your book. Practice the reading.
Click on the sentences to practice reading.
text: The cat has a nap in dad's lap

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Play an ordering game. Select ordering, then 'forwards 1 to 20'
In your notebook, page 35, order the numbers from least to greatest. Then from greatest to least
Share your answers by using the following sentences. Click on them to practice
text: I ordered the numbers from least to greatest.
I ordered the numbers from greatest to least.

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Open your book on page 41 and ask questions to your partners after looking at the fruit words. Practice:
Open your book on page 41 and write the date: 2-2. Complete exercise 6.
Take homework. Book page 38. Paste the stickers.
Watch the video. Raise your hands to say sentences about the families.
Read the words and then find the words in the text (pages. 44,45,46 book). Highlight them using different colors.
Find words and underline them with different colors. Look at the previous presentation to find the words.
Find words and underline them with different colors. Look at the previous presentation to find the words.
Find words and underline them with different colors. Look at the previous presentation to find the words.
Transition B goes to the ipad rooms during the second hour.

title: Which numbers of multiples of ten?
subject: Math

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the instructions to work on page 31 in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 31. Solve the exercise as instructed in the video
Share your answers by using the sentences '2 tens equals 20, etc.'
Take homework, notebook page 33. Find the given sum using tens and write the numerals to the tens.

title: Reading Practice: A Day for Dad
subject: Lang

instructions.c: Practice reading a 'Day for Dad'. Click on the sentences and repeat.

words.cap: Dad and I do things together on father's day.
Dad and I eat breakfast on father's day.
Dad and I eat breakfast on father's day.
Dad and I ride bikes on father's day.
Dad and I play catch on father's day.
Dad and I have a picnic on father's day.
Dad and I buy caps on father's day.
Dad and I take naps on father's day.

instructions.c: Practice reading phrases. Click on the green phrases and use your microphone to record:

title: What do you eat for breakfast?
subject: Lang

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the video and ask your friends what they eat for breakfast
In your book, page 40, ask your partner what he or she eats for breakfast. Don't forget to write the date. Read instruction number 3 on your own.
Watch the video and solve the exercise on page 28 in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 28. Write today's date: 1-2. Remember the steps in the video.
TRANSITION A CAN GO TO THE IPADS ROOM AND READ STORIES.
Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the video and learn how to order numbers in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 30. Remember the steps in the video.
You can pause the video to remember the steps.
Read your answers. Say sentences like '42 COMES BEFORE 43' and '43 COMES AFTER 42'
If you have time, order numbers in your whietboard.
Explore the elements of Unit 2
Watch the video showing a family in the Encanto movie. Then talk about that family.
Pay attention to the teacher describing his family. Do the same in your notebook.
Open your notebook on page 27 and do the activity

subject: Math

instructions.c: Explore the elements of Unit 2
Learn how to add numbers in a triangle:
Now, add the numbers in your notebook, page 28. Write the date, 31-1, and remember the steps in the video.
